name: AXE MADNESS!!!
description:
!!!!!!! I MADE THIS ONE IN ~6 hours... got carried away a bit :D !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This game is for TriJam-19, theme: axe madness. It's super-mario level 1-4 attemted knock-off. 

Because of the theme.. I decided that it features the creators of the jam @RocknightStudios as main characters. Enjoy! :D

Music and sound credits:

https://freesound.org/people/DavidOburke/sounds/332381/
https://freesound.org/people/jeckkech/sounds/391670/
https://freesound.org/people/TolerableDruid6/sounds/458251/
